lines.gurmukhi: Aibigiq giq kq Awvq AMqir giq AkQ kQw su kih kYsy kY sunweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Abigiti Gati Kat Aavat Antari Gati , Akad Kadaa Su Kahi Kaisay Kai Sounaaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: How can the mysteries of the eternal Lord be brought into mind? He cannot be described. How can He be explained through words?

lines.gurmukhi: AlK Apwr ikDO pweIAiq pwr kYsy drsu Adrsu ko kYsy kY idKweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Alakh Apaar Kidhau Paaeeati Paar Kaisay , Darasu Adarasu Ko Kaisay Kai Dikhaaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: How can we reach the beyond end of the infinite Lord? How can the invisible Lord be shown?

lines.gurmukhi: Agm Agocru Aghu ghIAY DO kYsy inrlMbu kaun AvlMb TihrweIAY
lines.transliteration_english: Agam Agocharu Agahu Gaheeai Dhau Kaisay , Niralanbu Kaoun Avalanb Tthahiraaeeai ?

Shabad OS B.translation: The Lord who is beyond the reach of the senses and perception, how can the Lord who cannot be caught be held and known? The Lord Master needs no support. Who can be assigned as His support?

lines.gurmukhi: gurmuiK sMiD imlY soeI jwnY jw mY bIqY ibsm ibdyh jl bUMd huie smweIAY ]253]
lines.transliteration_english: Gurmukhi Sandhi Milai Soee Jaanai Jaa Mai Beetai , Bisam Bidayh Jal Boond Hui Samaaeeai ?253?

Shabad OS B.translation: Only the Guru-conscious seeker experiences the infinite Lord who himself goes through that state and who is completely immersed in the True Guru blessed elixir-like words of the Guru. Such a Guru-conscious person feels free of his body bondages. He merges
